sub_categorieen.beschrijving: A brick or plate that is sloped on the horizontal axis.

types.beschrijving: Wedge Plates with a 45° angle
The 63° angle is the result of cutting off a section with a 1:2 ratio.
The 72° angle is the result of cutting off a section with a 1:3 ratio.
The 76° angle is the result of cutting off a section with a 1:4 ratio.
The 80° angle is the result of cutting off a section with a 1:6 ratio.
Wedge plates with compound angles and plates with studs positioned at multiple angles.
Smooth tiles with an angled or wedge shape.
Parts with compound angles that combine attributes of a wedge and a slope in a single piece.
Parts which combine an inverted slope and a wedge shape.
Bricks with one or more angled corners.

hoofd_categorieen.beschrijving: Build streamlined or organic shapes using a rich palette of curved parts.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Bricks which are curved along the horizontal plane.
Plates that are curved on a horizontal plane.
Blates which are curved along a horizontal plane.
Tiles which are curved along a horizontal plane.
Cylinders have just one wall and are curved relative to a horizontal plane.
Cones have a circular base and come to a point on the top.
Dishes and domes are curved elements that look like the top of a sphere.
Balls are spheres made out of LEGO.
These parts are curved on a single vertical axis.

types.beschrijving: A collection of (Double) Curves with a 1-stud diameter when viewed from the side.
Parts that have a curve that goes up 2/3 of a brick in the distance of 2-studs.
Parts that have a curve that goes up the height of one brick in the distance of 3-studs.
Parts that have a curve that goes up the height of one brick in the distance of 4-studs.
Parts that have a curve that goes up the height of one brick in the distance of 8-studs.
Parts that have a curve that goes up the height of one brick in the distance of 1-stud.
Parts that have a curve that goes up the height of 2-bricks in the distance of 2-studs.
Parts with a curve along the bottom edge.
Curved parts with a different radius, or other less common attributes.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Panel elements that are curved.
An arch is a curve that spans an opening, and a bow is half of an arch.
Curved wedges are curved on multiple axes at the same time.
Mudguards are curved on a vertical plane and often found around wheels on a vehicle.
A selection of parts that are shaped like a heart or a star.
Other curved parts which do not fit well in any other category.

hoofd_categorieen.beschrijving: Panels, walls, doors, en andere gerelateerde onderdelen voor gebouwen

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Windows, doors en hun bijpassende frames.
Panels are thin parts with just one wall.
A selection of fences (without studs on top) and railings (with studs on top).
Parts with a textured exterior mimicking stone, brick, wood, or grilles.
Purpose-built pieces to add a staircase to your model.
Structural elements that do not fit well anywhere else.
Pieces which are used to hold, store, display, or protect other parts.

hoofd_categorieen.beschrijving: Parts that bend or rotate, allowing for a wide range of interesting building techniques.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Clips can attach to other parts in this category such as a bar, handle, or lightsaber blade.

types.beschrijving: A cylindrical part that can be grabbed with a clip or inserted into a hollow stud.
A c-shaped part which can firmly grasp a bar or handle.
A handle is a bar element that is closed on one or both ends.
Most flags attach to a bar or handle with one or more clip.
A few doors use a bar and clip system.
Ladders and railings that have the right diameter for a clip to attach to them.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Hinges, click-hinges, and turntables allow you to connect LEGO parts at angles along a single axis.

types.beschrijving: Parts which can turn to any angle on a single axis.
Plates with one or more click-hinge connection.
Bricks with one or more click-hinge connection.
Other parts that use the click-hinge connection.
Turntables allow you to rotate parts on a horizontal plane.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: The larger 'ball' and smaller 'towball' connections can be used to attach parts at any angle.

types.beschrijving: A small ball and matching socket that allows you to position parts at any angle.
A larger ball and socket that is significantly stronger than a towball Joint.
The click-socket is a very strong angular connection.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: These parts are often used to add visual texture to a model by adding horizontal or vertical lines, but they can also be used to allow parts to slide horizontally or vertically.
Flexible plastic elements, cord or fabric

types.beschrijving: Plastic chain comprising individual links
While the middle of this part has the x-shaped profile of a Technic Axle, the bar connection on either end is used to attach this to other LEGO parts.
Flexible hose with ribs
A fairly rigid but flexible tube
A very flexible tube to attach pneumatic components
Other flexible LEGO elements
Thin string and cord.
Flexible rubber bands and belts
Other flexible parts such as bracelets and rings.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: One-off parts that twist, rotate, or slide.

hoofd_categorieen.beschrijving: The classic LEGO Minifigure and Friends Minidoll live in a rich world of clothing, accessories, weapons, and containers.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Head, torso, and legs to create a classic LEGO Minifigure.
Head, torso, and legs required to build a Minidoll. (Minidolls were introduced in 2012 with LEGO Friends.)

types.beschrijving: There are four Minidoll torsos representing a girl, boy, woman, and man.
This includes skirts, dresses, and ball gowns.
A variety of bifurcated garments for Minidolls.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Larger figures based on characters from fantasy or science fiction worlds.
Parts that are almost exclusively used for Robots or Droids.
Human figures that are smaller than a Minifigure or Minidoll.
Hair for Minifigures and Minidolls.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Minifigs are on the move with these parts that attach to their feet.

A selection of tools and equipment that LEGO Minifigs and Minidolls need to take care of their respective realms.

When conflict arises in the LEGO universe, you might need one of these.
It's easier to get around LEGO City when you have some wheels.
LEGO parts that can launch a projectile a short distance.

hoofd_categorieen.beschrijving: Plants, animals, teeth, tails, and elemental forces bring the LEGO world to life.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: Leaves, vines, ferns and small trees bring the LEGO universe to life.
There is a lot blooming in LEGO City thanks to this selection of flower elements and stems which hold them.
Fruits and Vegetables.
A wide range of animals are available to liven up your creations.
A selection of teeth to give your models some bite.
Other natural elements including horns, tails, webs, shells and wings.
Spider Webs and Strands
Fire, Water, Wind, Ice, and Stone.

hoofd_categorieen.beschrijving: Wheels allow your model to move, brackets make them stronger, noses make them look faster, and tracks give them somewhere to go.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: You can get wheels with matching tires, as well as wheels with integrated tires. They are organized by the diameter of the Wheel.

Wheels with a 43.2mm outer diameter (D.) and tires that work with them.
Wheels with a 56mm outer diameter (D.) and tires that work with them.
A windscreen is a panel that is sloped on a vertical axis.
Motorcycle wheels are fairly large but narrow.
A selection of wheels with an integrated tire.
Wheels with uncommon shapes, sizes and connection types.

hoofd_categorieen.beschrijving: The larger bricks for younger kids are twice as big in each direction and compatible with regular LEGO bricks.

sub_categorieen.beschrijving: DUPLO bricks are twice as large in all three dimensions than a comparable LEGO brick.
A DUPLO plate is just ½ the height of a DUPLO brick, which makes it the same height as a LEGO Brick.
DUPLO parts come in a couple of different angles.
DUPLO includes a small selection of curved elements to build more interesting models.
